name: LD-36 VHS Rental - A retail nightmare
name_original: LD-36 VHS Rental - A retail nightmare
description:
Some people are telling you that VHS tapes are obsolete "ancient" technology. Lies! You wont let this rental store go out of business!

Suffer through your shift at the video rental store, where you must assist helpless customers in renting the movie they're really looking for.

Each customer will give you a clue as to what movie they really want to rent, click on the movie that matches to earn the business money!

Click on the movie they really want +$25

Click on a movie of a matching genre but not the right movie +$25

Click on the wrong movie and they trash your VHS tape -$25

Good luck!

Post your scores!

(A game developed for the compo of Ludum Dare 36)
